page.title: 19THE ICE RINK
page.content: {T}he Ice Rink is a place where you can go and either watch people skating,or do some yourself. It costs 100p for an adult and 75p for a child. If you want to do some skating you can hire some skates. Some people come with their own skates. It is great to play on the ice. Sometimes the Whitley Warriors play Ice Hockey at the Ice Rink. {T}he Ice Rink is in Shields Road,at the top of Hillheads Road. It is on a very busy main road,but there is a Pelican Crossing nearly opposite the Ice Rink.
